generic-plugin.name: CobblerServerPlugin
generic-plugin.description: A plugin that integrates a Cobbler server into RHQ
generic-plugin.serverplugin:help: This plugin will periodically sync the RHQ content subsystem with that of a Cobbler server.

c:simple-property.name: enabled
c:simple-property.description: Determines whether or not Cobbler will be synchronized with RHQ content

c:simple-property.name: scheduleType
c:simple-property.description: Indicates the type of trigger this synchronize job will use

c:simple-property.name: scheduleTrigger
c:simple-property.description: Determines how often Cobbler will be synchronized with RHQ content. Based on the schedule type, this is either the period, in milliseconds, or the cron expression.

c:simple-property.name: concurrent
c:simple-property.description: This must always be false - only want one sync job running at a time

c:simple-property.name: clustered
c:simple-property.description: This must always be false - each RHQ server will run this job to sync their own Cobbler server

c:simple-property.description: TODO this is just a placeholder
